name: Are We Alone Now?
description:
CONTENT WARNING

Contains Blood, Flashing Images and Gore.

Orion loves all of his stuffed animals, but lately, he's felt they've been a little distant. His favourite stuffy, Ritchie, wants to keep him safe by dismantling the others before they have a chance to hurt him.

Can you help him get rid of them before time runs out?

There are 10 different maps, you randomly spawn into one at the start! :]

All the stuffies have numerous locations they can spawn, so your experience will be a bit different each playthrough!

Thank you so much for the support, good luck. ;]
